import '../styles/ProjectCard.css'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import { ThemeContext } from '../contexts/ThemeContext'; export default function ProjectCard() { const { darkMode } = useContext(ThemeContext); const project = { image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6c/Star_Wars_Logo.svg/800px-Star_Wars_Logo.svg.png", title: "Music App", description: "Play, create playlists, like songs and discover music trends.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=nextjs,react,ts,tailwind,redis", liveLink: "https://music-app.vercel.app", codeLink: "https://github.com/usuario/music-app" }; return (

{project.title}

{project.description}

Live Code
); }
